title: Improved isoprene detection performance of Si-doped WO3 films deposited by sputtering and post-annealing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13618-13627
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00184B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pin-Kuan Lin, Yi Qin, Xiaoding Qi, Liji Huang
Sputtered films of Si-doped WO3 showed a good selective sensing for isoprene with rapid response/recovery times, which were less than 1.5 and 3.0 seconds, respectively.
